name: Burrito Bear
description:
Burritos are raining from the sky - Bear wants to eat them, but colliding with dangerous falling garbage causes serious gas! Before indigestion strikes, Bear needs your help to eat them all!




Burrito Bear is on a never-ending quest for fullness that spans diverse areas and includes fashion-forward accessories for them to mix-and-match while reaching ultra burrito eating euphoria!






  • Eat Burritos - Shove as many delicious burritos into Bear’s mouth as possible!
  • Power Ups - Consume and interact with a wild variety of juiced-up power-ups to aid (or inhibit) Bear in their stinky journey for maximum fullness!
  • Customize Bear - Collect numerous outfits, accessories, and tools to completely deck out Bear; some of which can be used to get and edge up on falling garbage!
  • Traverse Multiple Areas - Using special warp burritos, Bear can fart out massive wormholes to send them across space and time to other lands!
  • Different Modes - Play through three different modes: Story, Arcade, and Endless!
  • Online Leaderboards - Climb the ranks and become Top Bear!
  • Original Soundtrack - Jam out to bunch of funky jams created by D Fast!
